scripts.dev: npm run watchman-del && EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 expo start --web --clear
scripts.android: npm run watchman-del && EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 expo run:android
scripts.ios: npm run watchman-del && EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 expo run:ios
scripts.start: npm run watchman-del && EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 expo start --dev-client --clear
scripts.build: EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 expo export -p web && cp staticwebapp.config.json dist/staticwebapp.config.json && cp vercel.json dist/vercel.json
scripts.watchman-del: command -v watchman >/dev/null 2>&1 && watchman watch-del '../../' || echo 'Watchman not found (`brew install watchman`), skipping.'
